talk.abstract: Ember is a JS framework based on established conventions that allows writing complex applications with a small amount of code. Ember-data is the component that connects this framework with a REST API. Unfortunately, the conventions followed by its community are not compatible with Tastypie, one of the most widely used Django libraries. This adapter makes all these technologies work together.
talk.description: Ember is a JS framework based on established conventions that allows writing complex applications with a small amount of code. Ember-data is the component that connects this framework with a REST API. Unfortunately, the conventions followed by its community are not compatible with Tastypie, one of the most widely used Django libraries. This adapter makes all these technologies work together.
talk.name: An Ember.js adapter for Django
talk.title: An Ember.js adapter for Django
